import React from 'react'; const ContactMe = () => { return(
Contact Me

Mobile no. : +91 9752884725

Email address: palash.jaithwar@gmail.com

Address: 49, Sajjan Mill Road, Ratlam(M.P.)

) } export default ContactMe;
